headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication . Note : Specify the same access token that you used to create the asynchronous report task. Otherwise, the request might fail.

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: advertiser_id
parameters.description: Advertiser ID. Note : If you use advertiser_ids when calling /report/task/create/ (POST method), you need to set this field to one of the Advertiser IDs specified via advertiser_ids .

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of an asynchronous report task that is either queued or currently being processed. To obtain such a task ID, first use /report/task/create/ to create an asynchronous report task. Then use /report/task/check/ to confirm that the status of the task is QUEUING or PROCESSING before attempting to cancel it.
